website_summaries.verdict: A good quality, versatile frame at an affordable price tag that has an elegant, minimalist appeal.
pros: Users appreciate that this is a good value for the price, and that it is both lightweight and easy to hang
We love that it gives a classic and streamlined look that really lets photos or prints stand out
cons: A few received frames with damage or defects such as chipped or etched glass

customer_reviews.title: Great frames; a tad smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: These things are great! The glass snaps in and out easily. I really like the sleek look. But like others have stated, a standard 8.5x11 sheet of paper does not fit without wrinkling. You'll have to trim about 1/8" off the side and top in order for it to fit without wrinkling. I had read this in the reviews, and was kind of expecting it. And since I have a paper trimmer, it didn't bother me at all to have to trim them. I'm using these to display pictures that I've colored. I've added photos showing the size of their insert laying on top of a sheet of printer paper with a ruler showing the measurement difference.
customer_reviews.author: LauraC

customer_reviews.title: Not actually 9x12
customer_reviews.text: Overall for the price these frames are about what I expected. Except for one critical part. My 9x12 prints wouldn't fit in them. I got out the tape measure and sure enough the actual opening is 8 and 7/8ths x 11 and 7/8ths. As you can see in my picture the line for 9 actually extends beyond the edge. While these would be great for something that is just under 9x12 I would have had to cut my prints down or damage the edges trying to force them in.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick from Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice frames for the price! Worked great for our clock project...
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 12 pack, and for the price, these frames exceeded my expectations. These actually have real glass, which I think looks better than plexiglass or plastic used in other low cost frames. I would order these again!
customer_reviews.author: Malloryyy

customer_reviews.title: It fits 8.8x11.8 NOT 9x12 items
customer_reviews.text: Should have listened to other reviews. Did NOT fit my 9x12 painting. Seriously pissed. Look at the wrinkles now trying to fit it in there?!?!?! Come on people... Don’t say 9x12 if 9x12 won’t fit!
customer_reviews.author: KPeters13

customer_reviews.title: Incredible design with simple loading
customer_reviews.text: These are super minimalist, but that's great. If you have limited edition posters and you get the right dimensions, these frames will let the poster jump into the foreground. There are virtually no bezels and the measurements are clearly perfected -- there's no margin of error. They look great. I've seen other reviews have marks against the shipping, but I got mine and they were absolutely perfect with styrofoam protecting them. I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Nicodemus

customer_reviews.title: The Shipping WILL Destroy the Frame
customer_reviews.text: So here's the deal. If you receive the frame and it's not broken, it's a solid, useful, plain glass frame that does its job. You just might need to order it three or four times before you receive it. The boxes the frames come in constantly brake the glass and make the product useless. Luckily, it's easy to get a replacement with Amazon, but it really shouldn't come to that. Also, if you get a 6-pack, you can count on at least 2, if not more, of the frames being chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Michael DeMinico

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold 8-1/2 x 11 paper!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, fails at the most basic necessity, which is that it properly hold the size paper it claims to be designed for. I don't have a paper trimmer, so I'm left with either visible raggedly edges, or paper that isn't lying flat and ends up looking terrible. Bought a six-pack and tossed them all. Worthless for the stated purpose, however well-made. I shouldn't need to read reviews to find out that your stated dimensions aren't real.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelInThePNW

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT 8 1/2 x 11 printer or glossy photo paper as STATED!  It ripples the paper as is!
customer_reviews.text: I did some photo prints for Christmas for my family and wanted 8 1/2" x 11" document frames to easily frame them in. I had to trim my fine 8 1/2" x 11" photo prints with a razor knife on two sides to get them to fit. Annoying, dangerous, and totally unacceptable. And yes I tried several brands and types of printer and glossy photo paper to no avail! Refer to photo these frames appear to be 3mm off on top and 2mm off on the sides. The frame shelf talker is sitting on top of REAL 8.5 x 11 paper....see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Broganator

customer_reviews.title: Nice frame, cheap
customer_reviews.text: I got this because anything looks better on the wall when it's in a frame, but I am not the kind of person who wants to spend a lot on that. I'm very happy with this one. It seems pretty sturdy, and it was easy to load. I've had other front-loading frames which were giant pains to get a picture into. I don't know if that means this one is designed better, or maybe I just wasn't a klutz this time around. Anyway, I like it enough to write a review, so that must mean it's pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Boxbody

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Simple!
customer_reviews.text: Inexpensive yet attractive and professional looking frame! Construction is excellent, inserting a print or poster is a cinch and it hangs perfectly. The only problem is that the possibility of it arriving damaged is high due to the glass. Amazon replaced it free of charge (thank you as always, Amazon!) and the replacement came in without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: D. Yates

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for your money
customer_reviews.text: I guess I have been lucky; I have bought probably two dozen various MCS frames in different sizes, and so far, only one has arrived with broken glass. Since it is an item containing a thin sheet of glass and prone to breakage, I accept that percentage, especially as Amazon is sending a replacement immediately. As for the quality of the frames in general, I am extremely pleased. Lightweight, easy to load, easy to hang. Classic and clean lines, with minimal visible frame to distract from whatever I am framing. There is a reason I keep ordering MCS frames, and only MCS frames. For the price and quality, these are pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: xeyda

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, quality photo frames - fantastic design!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I needed. Very low cost considering the quality and the amount of frames you get! The frames can be hung on your wall or made to stand on a surface. Very easy to pop the glass frame in and out as well! Fantastic design. Thank you MCS Industries!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed for all my con prints!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of six of this size & six of the 9x12, shipped to Hawaii & all arrived intact! I was weary of pushing on the glass to get it out & then pushing it back in, but honestly it feels strong & is a very fast process! Every print I bought from my local con all fit perfectly, no trimming required. They look great on the wall, very narrow frame so the focus is on the artwork. Very easy to hang in either orientation, too. Perfect for the massive haul of signed prints from visiting comic conventions!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Great frames, with one caveat
customer_reviews.text: Great frames for the price, with one caveat. Nice design, displays full image (i.e., is full 8x10, not 7.5x9.5 as in most other frames). Note, however, that the glass has a very very slight grey tint; this tint is probably not noticed by most customers, but if you're a photographer who has spent a lot of time getting the print's color, brightness, etc., just right, you may notice that the tint, and the glass's reflection, cause your print to look slight dull and a wee bit grey.
customer_reviews.author: js001

customer_reviews.title: fits too snugly for 8.5 x 11" paper, but okay for heavier gauge like certificate
customer_reviews.text: I'd have been fine with these as a very inexpensive frame option, save for the deal breaker that when I attempted to load in a piece of expensive 8.5x11" paper, it could only get situated inside the internal frame holder by rippling the paper in a very noticeable manner. Alternatively, one could run a finger nail or spoon edge to crease the paper's edges all the way around, but it really made the thought of doing so for >5 letters too much to want to take on. Good news is that the Amazon Prime return/refund was wonderfully easy and no charge, just printed label and dropped off at UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Lozier Family

customer_reviews.title: Cannot believe how great this is!
customer_reviews.text: Most reviews were very good for this but I had my doubts due to the low price. I received it in perfect condition and very secure packaging. The pop out glass lifts from the top so no struggling with trying to slide your picture in and secure with a slide back. Just like the description, the Glass sides are polished and safe to handle. It took me less than a minute to frame my art. I will buy MANY more of these! The frame is simple and contemporary and sturdy. Unbelievable price! Thanks to the manufacturers for making a quality frame that’s not junk!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Joy

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality for not-so-cheap price
customer_reviews.text: These were the exact frames I needed for an art project, & they arrived quickly. They were individually plastic wrapped in a box. This was in another box packed with air cushions and brown paper. Very secure, right? I've opened 3 frames thus far, and each one has had a piece of a corner broken off from the frame. Because of a deadline I had to use these frames, but I will never order them again. The price for such poor quality workmanship is simply not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Shopper

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT 12X12 PHOTOS
customer_reviews.text: I got these to put my 12 x 12 size photos in them. They do not fit. You need smaller photos roughly 11.75 x 11.75. Doesnt seem like a big deal, just shave it down you're probably thinking, but I dont feel like i should have to alter my photos when the frame says 12 x 12, it should fit a 12 x 12 photo in it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice.....but
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the six pack, only needing 5 of them. They are really nice, and really look good. The thin frame edging, leaves emphasis on the beautiful poster I put inside. They were gifts and everyone who received them loved it. I am giving it 4 stars, because, just like many people said, one was indeed broken along the bottom corner of the glass. It actually had a small chunk fall out........and had I needed it, it would not have been usable. That said, I figured, that with only 5 usable frames, it still came out to $7.60 per frame, and I thought that was a good deal!! I would order this again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: hair brush

customer_reviews.title: Fits weird
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really fit the photo which was in fact 12x12 and I had ordered the 12 x 12 frame. Got this for an autographed photo and pretty disappointed that I had to slightly bend the edges to make it fit in the frame. Now the photo is rippled in the frame now :(
customer_reviews.author: brattybcat

customer_reviews.title: For the price - can't be beat: great frames
customer_reviews.text: Yes, one of the frames arrived broken due to shoddy packaging. BUT! For the price, these can't be beat. I used them as table numbers and other signage for my wedding. They're now serving as frames to give away photos from the wedding! They're easy to use once you get the hang of popping out the glass (only takes trying 1 or 2), the glass is clean, and they stand up well. I'll absolutely order again.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Decent Frame for Hanging but not standing
customer_reviews.text: While I love these for my Scratchboard art because they snap in pretty perfect to size, the reason for the 4 stars is the plastic tab that is for standing the frame up is not well thought out, doesn’t go into place easily if at all, so I have resorted to using them for hanging only. They do have good hanging framework either portrait or landscape. They are plastic so consider that but overall have a very clean minimalistic look that work for my art.
customer_reviews.author: zuriel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely more than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to frame some prints for a friend's baby shower, I was actually quite amazed at the quality of these. They were definitely more than I expected. The frames are plastic but a decent quality build and the window is actual glass. The glass is clean cut with smooth edge glass, you don't have to be scared of potentially cutting yourself (I've bought some not so good frames with glass that's got some sharp edges). Super easy to use (they even have a video demo), the glass popped out without any difficulty and sits very snug once it's back in its frame. They also have this simple, elegance to them -- thin black trim, clean finish, great value!
customer_reviews.author: Melinda L.

customer_reviews.title: Very good frames
customer_reviews.text: I made a large photo wall and needed a lot of frames. I bought these in multiple packs of all sizes and they worked wonderfully. For the price you really can't go wrong. The only little problem I had was when you insert a mat the glass doesn't close as tightly (it opens from the front) I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Watson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use but May Wrinkle
customer_reviews.text: I have used these in the past for photos in my teenage bedroom and loved them. Now, I order them for use in our facilities for official postings. They are simple to use (pop glass out, insert document, pop glass in, hang on a push pin or nail in the built in holes). One tiny issue, if you are just using a sheet on 8.5 x 11 paper, it will likely wrinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Family in Frames
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in different sizes for a family photo wall. Worked perfect. Love the look!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mia Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great frames, with a caveat
customer_reviews.text: Great frames for the price, with one caveat. Nice design, displays full image (i.e., is full 8x10, not 7.5x9.5 as in most other frames). Note, however, that the glass has a very very slight grey tint; this tint is probably not noticed by most customers, but if you're a photographer who has spent a lot of time getting the print's color, brightness, etc., just right, you may notice that the tint, and the glass's reflection, cause your print to look slight dull and a wee bit grey.
customer_reviews.author: js001

customer_reviews.title: Good for posters but the edges seem to chip easily
customer_reviews.text: These types of frames are good for posters because there's not a huge border around them but the edges were a little chipped on mine. I don't mind but someone else might...it's hardly noticeable in my case. Also I actually wanted it to be plexiglass instead of real glass because I didn't want it to be too heavy since I am using push pins in the wall to hang it. Thankfully even with the real glass, it's still pretty lightweight. I gave the packaging two stars because it was wrapped in cardboard with no protection around the edges and no bubble wrap...I was kinda surprised the glass didn't crack.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Fits 13x9 perfectly, simple to use, look GREAT.
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned a bit about these with recent reviews, but after getting 2 as a trial for 4 new posters, I can say not only do they look fantastic, but they were a breeze to insert and use. Going to get a few more of these for SURE.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Matthies

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are great. One thing I will note is that you ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great. One thing I will note is that you have to pop the glass out of the front to put the photo in (rather than more standard frames which have you lift the back out and put the photo in), which can be a bit nerve-racking the first couple times. Other than that these are great frames especially if you are looking to hang a lot of photos but don't want or need to spend an excessive amount of money on fancy frames. (same review as the larger 11x17 size frames)
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Great for a photo gallery on your walls.....it is on mine!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large family photo wall in my game room. I wanted the photos to be the rockstar rather than an assortment of heavy frames. I would not believe how much room the frames take on the wall, as I have so many more photos featured now. These are plastic imitations of the very expensive wood box frames. They look great and fool everyone that I have spent thousands of dollars on gallery frames. They are easy to unassemble for photo insertion and the glass is real. So no worry about looking crazed and scratched in years to come. I bought most every size so you will see this same review in the other sizes.
customer_reviews.author: KR Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Picture perfect
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to frames some our fav photos from our trip to Ireland. Love the way our memory wall turned. The frames were exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great frames
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! They are perfect. I'm using a wall.in my office and making a kind of collage of pictures. These are perfect for hanging on the wall (I'm not using them to sit on a table so can't speak to how they work for that). The came well packaged nothing was damaged. I really like the sleek slim design if these, they allow the picture in them to really shine. I'm ordering a second set now. I would highly recommend these if using them for the wall and if you want a simple slim frame to allow your photos to shine.
customer_reviews.author: LLV

customer_reviews.title: Good value, easy to frame your pictures with, just follow the video directions.
customer_reviews.text: I had my doubts because of the low price. But I am very pleased with the purchase. The frame is made of black plastic that looks elegant, and the glass that covers your picture is good quality. I saw that some people had difficulty with framing their pictures, but I can't understand that because if you follow the video directions on the order page it's really easy and fast. Maybe 5 minutes, probably a lot less. Trust me, it aint rocket science. If you have some art work or a photo that you want to put on the wall or just protect, get it.
customer_reviews.author: Misterpicker

customer_reviews.title: Great frames, great price
customer_reviews.text: I love these frames. I got them to hang some prints in my home office, and I'll probably buy more. All of my frames arrived in perfect condition, and after watching the video it was easy to insert my pictures. I actually like that they're lightweight, I'm not worried about them pulling out of my rather thin walls. I also really like that the frame is thin, it doesn't distract from the artwork. You can't find a better price for 6 frames, and I'm very happy with my purchase. I'll be buying more frames from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: not quite right, but overall good and cheap
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, this is exceptionally annoying, as it is a wee bit too small. You will have to trim an 8.5 x 11" piece of paper by a portion on each (width & length) dimension to get it to fit. I had to do a bunch of these and it was annoying, BUT these are just so cheap that I could afford frames for a whole group. Would I pay a bit more for a better fit? Sure. Would I turn down a workable, affordable solution because of some annoyance? No.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic, cheap and perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I am doing an art project in my house under my kitchen cabinets. Being plastic, they are perfect for my needs. I had to drill a small hole in the frame in the back so I could use a hang wire and attach to the wood ledge at the bottom of the cabinets. These are priced about 1/2 what they are at the big box arts and crafts store. They come well packed and have actual glass. I find that thicker material does not always allow the glass to snap securely in place. A little dab of clear silicone in each corner took care of that.
customer_reviews.author: BLD

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had a series of 6 pictures to hang. While searching for frames I came across this six pack, which was perfect. When I received them I discovered that they are front loading, and was worried that this would be difficult to accomplish without damaging the pictures. I soon discovered they are very easy to load. They have a real glass cover, a hanging hole, and an optional stand that does not get in the way of hanging like some frames do. I am extremely pleased with these, and would not hesitate to purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: TwoDrummers

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are great. One thing I will note is that you ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great. One thing I will note is that you have to pop the glass out of the front to put the photo in (rather than more standard frames which have you lift the back out and put the photo in), which can be a bit nerve-racking the first couple times. Other than that these are great frames especially if you are looking to hang a lot of photos but don't want or need to spend an excessive amount of money on fancy frames.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Would/will buy again!!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with these frames, for the price! I ordered them to hang some bible verses I printed for my homeschool room. Upon opening each set of frames they all looked good, minus a few that had minor breaks on a corner, probably from shipping, (lots of dirt roads and potholes where we live). Pros: They look great and are quick and simple to use. My daughter and I inserted 15 printables in no time at all. Cons: You have to be careful popping the glass in/out, my daughter had a hard time with one and the glass broke. Overall - I would/will be ordering more in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Ley Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Decent enough frames, terrific price, but be careful not to break the thin plastic.
customer_reviews.text: These are very convenient, and the price is excellent, but the thin plastic frame can break quite easily. Be super careful when you are separating the glass, and even more so when snapping it all back together. In the process of framing five pictures, two frames broke. The design is actually quite ingenious, but the execution could use some improvement. As for aesthetics, they pretty much look like what they are — very inexpensive. I figured this would be the case, given the price. I don't think I'd order any more, but I'll wind up going through all 12 eventually. Bottom line, I'm not sorry I bought them.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine tonight and already used 4 out of the 6 that I bought. These are perfect because they show the entire picture, so nothing has to be cut off or gets covered by the frame. The only thing is that the edges on some of the frames are a little raggedy, but nothing too bad, and also that you have to cut off a very small sliver to make the photo fit length wise (as shown in the second picture), but it's so tiny that it won't affect the picture at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lici

customer_reviews.title: Buy these! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing frames...super simple and chic! Worked perfectly for my sons room. I will be ordering more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Not a true 8 1/2 x 11 Frame as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in bulk to frame original art work on standard 8 1/2 x 11 paper. I was saddened to find out afterwards that when placing the paper inside the frame, it DID NOT fit correctly. The paper had to be trimmed to fit inside the frame, or the paper wrinkled after the glass was put in place. Even though the price point was low, I would think the measurements would have been accurate. Thereby the rating is low in all categories.
customer_reviews.author: Terry K. Giancaterino

customer_reviews.title: Very Economical Beautiful Frames
customer_reviews.text: I used these to frame some 8 X 10 inch watercolor princesses and superheroes 8 X 10 poster art which I ordered to give as gifts. They are economical, very nice looking picture frames. The only concern I have is as it is very easy to slip the photo or picture art into the frame, I hope the kids I am giving them to will not accidentally slip the glass front from the frame. It is a simple front loading frame by popping out the glass from the corners by slight pressure by both hands on each corner. My hope is that they hang the framed art before this is even a possibility.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Fan

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with the stand part attached, cannot free-stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good value but the listing was pretty misleading. The 6 pack of 11x17 frames that I received did not have the little plastic piece that allowed it to stand freely. I bought this listing thinking I would be able to hang some and have a few standing free on a shelf, but I will have to hang all of them. Also, the packaging was okay but one of my frames came cracked. I just got them for my office so I’m not that upset about that part. I am mostly marking it down because it did not have the stand part attached.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Display
customer_reviews.text: It’s the perfect size without the huge borders and without covering any part of the poster. It is a bit flimsy though. The one I bought in 2015 is still going strong, but this one arrived very well packed with a crack in one corner. So I believe it was shipped with the crack, thus making QC something to be desired. It still holds the glass securely, so it’ll do. I wish they offered a UV glass option as well.
customer_reviews.author: A Hoosier

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t get all 6 frames
customer_reviews.text: There were suppose to be 6 frames in this package, I only received 1. I am extremely p***ed off by this. Where are the rest of my frames?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. Beware of size issue.
customer_reviews.text: Great price and love the thin frame and real glass. I knew about the size issues from reading other reviews so I knew what to expect. The frames are lightweight so they’re perfect for use with command strips on a dorm wall.
customer_reviews.author: RocWithYou

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several, and many of the glass elements came cracked or outright broken. I ordered a replacement, and the same thing happened. Between the two orders, I managed to get almost the total number unbroken (I just accepted one that was broken because I didn't really want to go through the return process again). The company really needs to change the way it packages and ships this product because it's clearly flawed. And it's dangerous for people opening packages and finding broken glass. For the product itself, it is okay. It does dim colors, but it's glass. Also, despite having cleaned the frames when I received them, I'm still waiting for the funny smell to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn020

customer_reviews.title: Good price, decent quality, but not a great fit
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about these frames is the price, and that they are decent quality. I created a wall mural, and used many of these. They were all uniform and worked fine. The reason for 3 stars: they are not the right size for 5x7 photos. They actually measure very slightly smaller. So, your choice is to fold the photo into the frame, add the glass, and allow the 4 corners to crunch slightly, or to cut your photos down about 1/8 of an inch each way. Just as a side note, I purchased the 4x6 and 8x10 as well, and there was no issue with either of those sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget-Friendly Frames
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to spruce up my kids' play area with their own paintings, but I didn't want to simply tape them to the walls. I also didn't want frames to break the bank for a simple project. These frames are sturdy, easy to use, and a great value for the purpose. They are ever-so-slightly smaller than a true 9"x12" (as some other reviews have noted), but it was so minimal and easy to work around for this kind of DIY project.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The frames themselves are pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, these are a little small. I'd say the glass is the advertized size, but the actual frame is smaller. I knew this would be the case - it just meant a little more work for me and my xacto knife. I used the backing to cut around and then everything fit ok. The frames themselves are pretty good for the price, and are more sturdy than I expected. I'm giving it four stars only because there was a bit of an imperfection in the glass of one of the frames.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect low profile frames
customer_reviews.text: These were absolutely perfect for what I needed. I didn't want to spend $10 each on a frame when all I needed was something simple. I also like that they come with the bracket on the so you can either hang it or sit it on a shelf somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Green

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful frame, possible production defect
customer_reviews.text: The frames are very nice and I was able to put the pictures in with relative ease. My only issue is that one of the frames was chipped on the edge, little shard of glass floating around, couldn’t have happened during shipping because it’s inside the black part of the frame, it seems more like it was damaged during packaging or during production. It’s not bad enough to send back, but makes me worry about buying another in the future..
customer_reviews.author: Aiko G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these frames!
customer_reviews.text: These frames are super quick and easy to use and the very slim profile creates a nice look. I have tons of posters that I like to frame and these are perfect because there's no large, gaudy edge to take attention away from the poster and it makes it easy to panel things next to each other without large gaps. Plus the frames themselves seem pretty sturdy and durable. The glass has some good weight and looks good and everything fits very snugly and nicely into the frame - nothing seems loose or shoddy. Basically, if you have to frame anything, you have to use these!
customer_reviews.author: Dean Marconi

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 different kinds of poster frames by accident. This one wasn't my favorite, but it wasn't bad either. In my opinion, the best ones are deep and have metal sides. And the border also overlaps the picture a little bit. This one has no border overlapping the picture. However the frame itself is made out of sturdy, straight looking plastic. Doesn't look cheap. 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Super Top Secret Username

customer_reviews.title: Love these frames, so well made
customer_reviews.text: These frames were absolutely perfect for our project. We did, like others, struggle with the size of the paper fitting to snuggly to properly lay flat, but because we used card stock we were ok. The glass is very nice, and the ease of putting them together was perfect. I ordered the pack of 6, and they were a great deal for the $$. Would highly recommend these. Hopefully they will get their frame size ever so slightly adjusted so that the 8 1/2” x 11 lay flat.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: I'll bepurchasing again (esp from this seller.)
customer_reviews.text: Arrived intact!! I was nervous, but they packaed these well and nothing was damaged before/during/after shipping. As for the product: these work well, and are super easy to frame pictures up too 11x17. I needed exactly 6 to complete the project and these match the other 4 I already had. If you are crafty enough you could possibly add a wood frame, but these are great as is.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it but arrived with slight damage
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this frame! It is so easy to load. I especially love how any picture you put inside it can be seen edge-to-edge with no overlap. Mine arrived with a slight chip in one corner of the glass. Not sure how it happened since the shipping packaging was made to hold the frame carefully. Since it's in the corner it's not a problem. I think I'm going to order another right away for my next naive folk art painting.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ann

customer_reviews.title: MCS 8.5x11 inch format frame 6 pack in black=Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I got two 6-packs of these frames for my husband's home office that I've been organizing for him and these frames are perfect for the 8.5x11 inch documents & certifications I needed to frame. The frames are nice quality and can be hung or propped up with the pop off piece provided within the back of the frame. Very nice quality at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: California Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to be gentler with these than you are a newborn baby
customer_reviews.text: Three of them are very damaged. One broken glass and two others with large scratches. Others had scratches on the glass but small enough I will just deal with them. Glass comes dirty and will need to be cleaned on both sides faces. They are so cheap you should expect to get what you pay for. If you don't mind the high potential for bad ones in the pack or the time to have to clean each go for it. I would prefer it was plexiglass because they are so cheap I just see more breaking down the road. You must be gentler with these than you are with a newborn baby. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: MCS 8.5x11 Inch but NOT 8.5 x 11 inch.
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap. They look cheap and they are cheap. Real glass, but the rest of it is cheap. And that's ok because I just needed some simple black frames. But they don't fit. I have lots of 8.5 x 11 photo paper and lots of photos of the same size and lots of frames in other colors that these photos fit into. But none of those photos fit into these frames. Too small. Just about 1/8 inch too small all around. What in the world? They don't measure these things? These are useless. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: anthonyg

customer_reviews.title: These frames offer minimal everything.
customer_reviews.text: Bare bones document holding. I bought these for photos, where I clustered a bunch together, and where the frame needs to take a backseat to the photos. If you are clustering a bunch together, go minimal, with something like these. If you hang one or two, they will look too underwhelming, so get a real frame with some thickness around the framing. Clustering a bunch? Get these. Hanging one or two? Get fancier stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Filandro

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: These have real glass, not plexi, so I was pleased with that. Be careful of fingerprints. Outside frame is medium good plastic - super easy to pop out glass, insert your item, and pop back together. Wear gloves if you want to avoid fingerprints. I put certificates in these - they are heavier paper than just copier paper so there's no trimming needed and no issue with them wrinkling. I've done two certificates as a test, but I bet I can get the rest done in no time. VERY PLEASED WITH THESE!!
customer_reviews.author: David Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for Their Price!!!
customer_reviews.text: The first set I ordered was shipped inside a different box (with another item I ordered from a separate entity altogether) and because of this, anyone who came into contact with it didn’t know how fragile it was. With that said 1 of the 12 frames came shattered. Unfortunately I needed 12 frames for the project i was working on, so I ordered another set- this time, it was the ONLY thing I ordered. Meaning the box it was shipped in had big “Fragile” markings, this time... they came all intact! If you’re hesitant on the quality, I’d say go for it, just order them separately from anything else you’re purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory McDonald

customer_reviews.title: You can’t beat the quality with real glass for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy little frames with real glass for a great price! These are perfect for my collection of 11” x 17” mini movie posters! Make sure that when you pop the glass out you are pressing up from underneath while pulling the corners back. It pops out just fine when you do it the correct way, but you run the risk of chipping the corners if you’re not careful. One of mine did that, but it was totally my fault. You cannot beat the price on these and they make your posters look great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick2209

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make a gallery wall and they're perfect. Easy to get the photos in and out and despite how inexpensive they are the front is glass not acrylic. I hang all my things with 3M picture hanging strips so I can't attest to how else to hang them, but 10/10 would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: easy to use frame, real glass front which I didn’t know so easy to get fingerprints on. but once the photo was inside, it looks great! the frame itself isn’t the most user friendly, but its very durable and for the price, it can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! I only ever leave reviews for products that have exceeded my expectations. I have looked for the right comic book frame for a year. Bought two other brands that didn’t look all that good unless if you already have them in a plastic holder. This is perfect. They have a little space around but is fine for me. You hold a corner and lightly push the glass out and do the same when putting the glass back. I have one more comic book so I plan to buy another. My comics are in a comic wrapper and in the frame no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Denise R.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, Makes Photos Pop
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time purchasing frames on Amazon. My first purchase with another seller resulted in one glass frame broken, so I decided to go with MCS. I purchased twelve 8x10s, twenty-four 5x7s, and twelve 8x8s. ZERO came broken. I'm so impressed with MCS. From their product, to their packaging, to their prices; It's a deal that can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O.

customer_reviews.title: A touch small, very minimalist.
customer_reviews.text: Edit- I've since learned a trick for these frames. If the paper is too large then leave the bottom side loose before putting the glass in. It will fold that edge a teeny bit and prevent warpage. End--- The design makes it a tight fit for letter size paper. I don't see wrinkles though. The edges are almost non-existent so what goes in the frame is the center of attention. I use them for printed photos and so far they are nice, but a bit too minimalist in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall L. Kiker

customer_reviews.title: These worked out perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I had to frame a few certificates and awards so I was looking for quantity with a due amount of quality. I didn't need or want anything fancy. I don't want the frame to take away from the subject matter. These worked out perfectly! They are very light so I can use the 3M Command strips to hang them on the wall without fear of them falling off. I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Grant

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for me.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something reasonably priced to display a LOT of photos, especially some military career pictures. (See photo) These worked very well. I read the reviews, but have ordered more than 50 frames and not a single problem with any. They were well packaged, and very easy to use. I did have to trim a very few 8 x 10 photos, but overall, I'm very happy with the finished result.
customer_reviews.author: phantomwishes

customer_reviews.title: great frames
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews have said their frames came broken but I ordered this and the 6-pack months ago and mine were perfectly fine. I took off a star because a regular size sheet of paper should fit according to the dimensions but you have to shave 2mm off the long and short sides off for it to actually fit. They hang on the wall well with thumb tacks and you can stand them up if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Yoona Lee

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: This frame arrive and I followed the directions exactly as printed to get it apart. I put the picture in and when I went to reinsert the glass, I sliced my finger open and realized that shards of glass had broken off the corners. I was still able to put the glass back on and it looked okay but when I went to hang it the glass completely shattered. Also, the directions and description indicated this frame could also be displayed standing, except the piece required to do this was not in the package and it appeared to have been broken off the back where it should have been. I had to literally throw it away. Do NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.author: lisa m

customer_reviews.title: Great frames and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: All of these frames arrived in good order. The packaging kept the glass intact. I had to wait for the 13x19 size to be in stock, but once they were in, the item shipped promptly. A great value. The instructions for getting the glass out was in the back of the frame and it was easy enough to take out but remains secure once put back into the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Bludgeon

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective way to hang lots of pictures
customer_reviews.text: I can get “free” (pay for shipping) 4” x 4” prints through my photo app so these are great for putting multiple prints up on the wall. I had contemplated getting those “print your Instagram photos” products, but the cost was too much. With these I can achieve a similar result for a fraction of the cost. With the added bonus of being changeable if I want to update them. We used 3M Command strips to hang them so no drilling holes or maiming stuff to the wall. The frames are lightweight with clean lines. They do have a piece on the back for standing them up on a table if desired.
customer_reviews.author: Noora

customer_reviews.title: Buy these NOW!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These frames are EXACTLY what I wanted!!! It's a pack of 6 frames and they are beautiful for what I wanted to frame. They are easy to pop out the glass and add your picture or a thin object (which I did both of!) and the glass pops right back in and holds the items nicely. They look so good on the wall and really enhances the space. You can also stand them up on your desk or end table. They are very sleek. You will love these too!
customer_reviews.author: Shari MacNeel

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: It was awesome. The packaging was great in several boxes, so if you get some broken is because of delivery and not the product per se. It fit most of my posters perfectly and is super simple to use. I'm very happy with this and I'll get more from them in the future. I'm no expert in frames but this one makes the picture or poster look great.
customer_reviews.author: Adan Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: A frame like a line-drawing box in a document
customer_reviews.text: I had a vision of my pictures mounted on the brick fireplace in our living room, and these frames made it come true. The bricks, the hardware cloth, and the pictures with their line-drawing box frames came together beautifully. Full disclosure: I glued two 3M Clear Decorating Clips to each frame to hang them on the hardware cloth.
customer_reviews.author: ttterk

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 (12) pack of these frames - they look great and so easy to install - unfortunately they are the same size of the certificate and therefore require that A) the certificate be trimmed or B) The frame is created to be 1/8 larger eliminating the paper kink associated with a same frame size as the certificate. (HELP)
customer_reviews.author: One A Marine Always A Marine

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would've read the numerous other reviews that said the frame was slightly too small for a 12x12 print because I couldn't figure out if the frame or my print was the issue. I guess I can cut it to fit but I'm not very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Starmaker K.

customer_reviews.title: This frame great for a photo gallery on your wall.....it's great on mine!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large family photo wall in my game room. I wanted the photos to be the rockstar rather than an assortment of heavy frames. I would not believe how much room the frames take on the wall, as I have so many more photos featured now. These are plastic imitations of the very expensive wood box frames. They look great and fool everyone that I have spent thousands of dollars on gallery frames. They are easy to unassemble for photo insertion and the glass is real. So no worry about looking crazed and scratched in years to come. I bought most every size so you will see this same review in the other sizes.
customer_reviews.author: KR Kingston

customer_reviews.title: They don't quite fit.
customer_reviews.text: One would think that inexpensive document frames would allow fitting of standard document size of 8.5 x 11 but both items I have put in these frames ripple because the don't quite fit. I suspect they're off by an eighth of an inch or less and I will experiment but still, couldn't they manage to make these things hold a standard piece of paper?
customer_reviews.author: Mary's Little Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about purchasing this frame because a few reviews said the glass arrived broken but the price was perfect and decided to give it a try. I’m decorating my home office giving it a chic vibe so this frame was perfect for this picture. It arrived very well packaged and I inserted a picture of how it was packaged. The frame is sturdy. I like it a lot and would definitely purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Nice frame for hanging, not for standing up
customer_reviews.text: These are nice frames and they showed up in great condition. However, the tab they have on the back to stand the frame up is cheap and easily breaks. I would recommend these frames for hanging, not for standing up.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: These 11 X 17 frames don't fit my 11 X 17 posters
customer_reviews.text: Of the six-pack, the only frame I opened was chipped on the corner. I have three 11 X 17 posters I've been meaning to hang, but unfortunately, they're about 1/16th of an inch too wide and too tall to fit into these frames. So either I got incorrectly sized posters or maybe these frames are metric or something. Not sure what I'm gonna do with this one. Probably gonna return.
customer_reviews.author: Mypenname

customer_reviews.title: Flawed design
customer_reviews.text: If you want to be able to set this frame on top of a surface (rather than hanging) as I did, then buy a different product. There's a cheap little piece of plastic intended to be detached and reattached to support the upright frame. At best it is flimsy, at worst it just simply collapses. I tried it with two different frames.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: They are more like 11 7/8 x 11 7/8
customer_reviews.text: As one other reviewer stated, these are NOT 12 x 12. They are more like 11 7/8 x 11 7/8. I have prints that measure exactly 12 x 12 and they do not fit. For the price, it's a great frame. But again, please read what I wrote because if you have something exactly 12 x 12, you'll have to do some trimming. The only reason I am giving it a 3 out of 5 is for this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this frame and it unfortunately arrived damaged. I contacted their customer service team and they immediately issued out a new frame without wasting any time and it came in a few days later! The frame looks great. The 11x17 is a perfect fit for my poster and will look awesome in my new office. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Francine

customer_reviews.title: One of the poster frames arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to receive these frames for my movie posters, however one of the frames has an uneven glass edge (see photo). In order to get a replacement I would have to send back all 6, even though the other 5 are fine. I do not want to go through the whole process of sending them back, waiting for a replacement and run the risk of another frame being defective. Amazon doesn't make it easy to return items that come in sets, and I'm pretty disappointed at how ineffective the return process has become.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherLeeez

customer_reviews.title: Nice Picture/ document frame
customer_reviews.text: I run a pool league and needed a frame for achievement certificates. These fit the bill exactly. They are reasonably priced (got the by the dozen price), has a glass front versus plastic. Only complaint is they inside frame size does not fit 8 1/2x11 photographic paper. I had to trim 1/16 inch from one of the sides and one of the ends. Not a big deal, just an extra step. Makes a nice looking presentation!
customer_reviews.author: Jim G.

customer_reviews.title: 2 of 3 were good
customer_reviews.text: Frames came quickly and well packaged. However ordered 3 and 1 had a VERY large crack in it from the corner to the middle . Was framing and giving as gifts so didnt have time to return and wait for new one to come in. 😞 so 2 out of 3 is a passing grade, but not a 4-5 star. But for the price, can't be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mel gav-hla

customer_reviews.title: great for works on paper
customer_reviews.text: I use these front loading frames for works on paper (paintings and collages). They are easy to assemble and add a classy touch to minimalist art. I would love to have this brand in white but they never seem to be in stock. I would recommend to anyone looking for a quick and affordable framing option for works on paper. I haven't tried photographic prints.
customer_reviews.author: Wimpy

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for concert posters!
customer_reviews.text: I had two Led Zeppelin concert posters from when they toured in my hometown in the 70s, and none of the frames that I had previously tried would fit them nicely without showing the cardboard in the back. The posters fit in these frames LIKE A GLOVE. They are perfectly displayed on my wall now, with no cardboard in sight. I will definitely be purchasing more of these as my poster collection grows.
customer_reviews.author: mashers90

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Reading the reviews I knew what I was getting and I wouldnt buy them again. The glass was cracked and even broken in some places. The plastic is fine and hangs just right but as with most reviews, you buy cheap you get cheap because most of the glass on most of the frames were broken. Also, not a true 8x10 fit so our photos were scrunched a bit. But for what we were framing we're not too upset. Just wouldn't use them for family photos or anything important.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great quick mount frame with glass panel
customer_reviews.text: Most frames have plastic panels and I am just old fashioned and love glass. It is quick and easy to mount my photos and I like the thin borders. I recommend custom framing for gifts, but these frames work great for my home gallery.
customer_reviews.author: Strodav

customer_reviews.title: nice frame's , very misleading dimensions
customer_reviews.text: Nice frames, exactly what I wanted although my 5x6.75 pictures did not fit. I got the 5x7 frames and they were not wide enough. I measured my pictures, exactly 5 inches wide and 6 3/4 inches tall. The frame was not wide enough and does NOT fit 5 inch wide pictures, very misleading and very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Johnson

product_meta.title: MCS 11x17 Inch Format Frame, Black (40962)
product_meta.description: Size:11 x 17 Inch| Color:BlackMCS Classic Format frames are simple to use and easy to hang. To put your picture in the thin edged frame, you just pop out the smooth trimmed glass, insert you picture and pop the glass back in the frame. The frame has molded openings in the back so you can mount the frame either vertical or horizontal. Clipped to the back of the frame is an adapter to make the frame into a standing frame (Instructions Included) This is our most popular picture frame of all time, the format frame is always in fashion and is always the right price. Format is a registered trademark of MCS Industries, Inc
feature_bullets: Frame has a thin black profile
Frame features front loading design with polished edge glass
Frame is ready for wall hanging either vertically or horizontally

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,916 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
